bibl.title: Genio loci. K 80-letiju Aleksandry Ivanovny Pavlovskoj i 50-letiju ee raboty v AN SSSR i RAN. [Genio loci. The 80th Birthday of Alexandra Ivanovna Pavlovskaya and 50th Anniversary of Her Work at the Soviet and Russian Academy of Sciences.]
